body:
Hey, are you on of those nerds who enjoy Mario and shit on the wii u?
Well guess what, now you can enjoy ur dank rainbow sheeps and mushroom stew because Minecraft is coming to Wii u.

To be fair i just find this really cringy, first they ruin their game and then they want it to go on a console which no one will buy it on..
https://youtu.be/bA_DioDvz9k

title: Minecraft on a new console?

replies.body: They're making money, so it doesn't matter what we think.
replies.body_tagged: They're making money, so it doesn't matter what we think.

replies.body:
it's not a bad idea. all the 5 year olds will go to wii u including ur bro robin ;)

maybe it's good for the pc community as well
replies.body_tagged:
it's not a bad idea. all the 5 year olds will go to wii u including ur bro robin ;)

maybe it's good for the pc community as well

replies.body:
It's good because they're tapping into the younger demographic.
The younger demographic for Minecraft will always be a big market segment for Mojang to utilise.
As Iron said, they're making money.

replies.body:
To fix that.

The video itself was cringy, however, Mojang will be getting a large sum of money if little kids (or my friend who still uses a Wii) are thirsty enough for MC on that console.

Clever move, Mojang. But, you're really screwing up the community.

replies.body: Microsoft bought Mojang (or Minecraft idk) to satisfy the younger age group.
replies.body_tagged: Microsoft bought Mojang (or Minecraft idk) to satisfy the younger age group.

replies.body: I like this idea. Everyone BUT Wii U has the game, it's not really fair if people who own a Wii U don't get to play a certain game while everyone else can.
replies.body_tagged: I like this idea. Everyone BUT Wii U has the game, it's not really fair if people who own a Wii U don't get to play a certain game while everyone else can.

replies.body: Nintendo suddenly just got interesting to all of those PS4 and Xbox One console peasents that play COD and hate on CS:GO...
